column1: #separator:Tab
#notetype:@En
#deck:En
#columns:En
column2: Cn

column1: I don't know what he wants.
column2: 我不知道他想要什么。

column1: She asked why I was late.
column2: 她问我为什么迟到。

column1: Tell me how you did it.
column2: 告诉我你是怎么做到的。

column1: He wondered whether it was true.
column2: 他想知道那是否是真的。

column1: We discussed what to do next.
column2: 我们讨论了下一步该做什么。

column1: Can you explain why you left?
column2: 你能解释一下你为什么离开吗？

column1: Let's consider how we can improve.
column2: 让我们考虑一下我们如何改进。

column1: I'm not sure whether they will come.
column2: 我不确定他们是否会来。

column1: She wondered what happened.
column2: 她想知道发生了什么。

column1: He explained how the machine worked.
column2: 他解释了机器是如何工作的。

column1: We need to decide whether to go.
column2: 我们需要决定是否要去。

column1: I can't remember what I said.
column2: 我不记得我说了什么。

column1: They asked why she was crying.
column2: 他们问她为什么哭。

column1: Show me how you solved the puzzle.
column2: 给我看看你是怎么解开谜题的。

column1: He questioned whether the plan was feasible.
column2: 他质疑这个计划是否可行。

column1: The teacher explained what the homework was.
column2: 老师解释了家庭作业是什么。

column1: She asked how long it would take.
column2: 她问需要多长时间。

column1: I'm considering whether to accept the offer.
column2: 我正在考虑是否接受这个提议。

column1: He wonders what she is thinking.
column2: 他想知道她在想什么。

column1: They debated whether they should continue.
column2: 他们辩论是否应该继续。

column1: What you need is more practice.
column2: 你需要的是更多的练习。

column1: Why he failed is still a mystery.
column2: 他为什么失败仍然是个谜。

column1: How they managed it is amazing.
column2: 他们是怎么做到的真是令人惊讶。

column1: Whether it will rain is uncertain.
column2: 是否会下雨还不确定。
